title: Collaborative Learning Course Utilizing ALERT STUDENT-Based Medical Education Management System

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic medical terminology and anatomy
context.additional_context: Learners systematically manage and share medical knowledge through a flashcard-based collaborative learning system, enhancing self-directed learning competencies using peer evaluation data.

learning_goals: Learners can generate and collaboratively share medical flashcard content with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can analyze weekly learning time data to develop personalized study plans.
Learners can interpret knowledge acquisition charts comparable to peers and improve weak areas.
Learners can prioritize content using a color-coding system with the goal of achieving a 70% or higher accuracy rate in quiz mode
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
